## Emergency {.unnumbered}

::: {.callout-important}
In case of emergency in the laboratory, workshop, or office:

1. call the ETH Emergency Desk: **+41 44 342 11 88** (from mobile) or **888** (from landline)
2. inform Dr. Jakub Tkaczuk (GSR & BSO): +41 44 632 31 62
3. inform Prof. Dr. Elizabeth Tilley.
:::

## Content {.unnumbered}

This website contains all the safety related documents for Global Health Engineering and is structured as follows:

### [Operational Safety](operational-safety.qmd)
Contains the group-specific operational safety concept, including general laboratory and workshop rules, hazard identification, and emergency procedures.

### [Chemical Safety](chemical-safety.qmd)
Provides information about the chemicals used within the group and the safety measures to mitigate chemical risks, including safety data sheets and disposal guidelines.

### [Biological Safety](biological-safety.qmd)
Contains the biosafety concept adapted to the needs of GHE, including procedures for working with biological agents and BSL2 laboratory guidelines.
